DOC.brief_summary: Activation of the hypothalamus-pituitary-adrenal system is monitored using saliva cortisol sampling during the antidepressant treatment with amitriptyline and paroxetine in moderately to severely depressed patients. Additionally, serum and plasma are sampled during the 5-week study period in order to study endocrine and metabolic parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Amitriptyline and Paroxetine Treatment of Major Depression
DOC.criteria: age: above 18 depression according DSMIV bipolar disorder substance dependency
